name: RadioStatic
0:
”Alexa, start Radio Static”
”Alexa, launch Radio Static”
”Alexa, resume Radio Static”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio static
des:
The Radio Static skill gives the familiar sound of radio static from an old A.M. radio.

It will loop for up to 1 hour. Radio Static is great for masking distracting noises, allowing you to focus, study, or relax in peace.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
